attributes.action: Strenghten police power to end civil unrest
attributes.additional_details: The police need to know that the majority of the public want them to have the powers to effectively protect us, a small minority may make a fuss about heavy handed tactics but ultimately these looters and rioters are causing needles damage and are ruining peoples lives. They only take part in these actions because they have no respect for the police force, so I ask the government to give their full support to the police to use all necessary force to apprehend these criminals, rather than to simply contain them.
